</div></div></div><p class="mol-para-with-font">Tim believed his brother would remain a danger whilever he refused to reveal the extent of his offending, including what he did with Samantha's body and how she was killed.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'He's still a paedophile,' Tim said. 'He's not rehabilitated at all - not one little bit - and he won't be until he fesses up and gets it out.'</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Tim spoke last year with the management team responsible for his brother and was told they could provide no information about his circumstances after leaving prison.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider has no other family and his brother said there was no one else from his past likely to contact him.'Everybody's offside with him,' Tim said.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'He's going to be completely on his own now, a complete loner.And everyone will be out for him.'</p><div><div data-track-module="am-related_carousel^related_carousel" data-track-selector=".rotator-panels a:not([class*=external])" data-dm-rotator-rotate="false" data-track-pos="static" data-preferred-shared-network-enabled="" data-dm-rotator-auto-init="" id="p-48" class="related-carousel with-fb-or-tw news" data-dm-rotator-active-class="active" data-dm-rotator-page-count="1.0" data-dm-social-article-auto-init="" data-dm-rotator-page-size="1"> <div class="rotator bdrcc"> <div class="rotator-title"> <h2>RELATED ARTICLES</h2> <ul data-page="next">Next</a></li> </ul> </div> <ul class="rotator-panels link-bogr1 linkro-ccox"> <li> <a href="/news/article-7425405/Serial-paedophile-killed-Samantha-Knight-using-fake-decades.html" illness revealed: Why child killer left jail with a...</span> </a> <a href="/news/article-7254917/Witness-saw-missing-schoolgirl-Samantha-Knight-killers-work-shed-shortly-kidnapping.html" href="/news/article-7157467/Brother-Samantha-Knights-killer-Michael-Guider-says-knows-schoolgirl-buried.html" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" class="external"> <span><i></i>Brother of Samantha Knight's killer Michael Guider says he knows where the...</span> </a> </li> </ul> </div> 
       
            
                <div class="fb">
                  <h2>Share this article</h2>
                  <div class="share"><span class="wai">Share</span></div>
                  <div class="count"><span>9.1k</span> shares</div>
                </div>
            
   </div> </div><p class="mol-para-with-font">Finding a permanent home for a sex monster who drugged and molested perhaps dozens of children in the 1980s and 1990s and was still considered a high risk of re-offending proved difficult.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Long-term prisoners such as Guider end up atNunyara, a 'non-custodial community-based service', because they have nowhere else to go after being released.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">That could be due to a lack of family and other support networks or even simply because of a short supply of boarding house rooms.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Recently released child sex offenders are considered even harder to place in outside accommodation than killers.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">A pariah such as Guider would also attract media attention which was unwanted by the residents and operators of even church or charity-run housing.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">At least when Guider was housed at Nunyara the community knew where he was staying.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">While some of Guider's fellow boarders could leave Nunyara during daylight hours, he was confined to the centre until suitable accommodation was found for him.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider's freedom is subject to 56 strict court-imposed conditions overseen by a Corrective Services department supervising officer (DSO) for the next five years.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">His current address - and any address thereafter for the next four years - must be approved by his DSO and he must abide by a 10pm to 6am curfew.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">No other person can enter and remain, or stay overnight, at his approved address without being cleared.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider must wear an electronic monitoring device and provide a weekly plan called a 'schedule of movements' three days before it is due to start.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He cannot go to any of the following places without approval: day care centres, pre-schools and schools, amusement parlours, amusement parks and theme parks, cinemas, libraries and museums.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He cannot enter camping grounds and caravan parks, children's playgrounds, parks and any areas with play equipment provided for children.</p><div class="artSplitter mol-img-group" style="style"> <div class="mol-img"> <div class="image-wrap"> <img id="i-4e697b8bdafd0d72" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2019/09/06/05/18137344-7434019-image-a-9_1567744867840.jpg" height="477" width="634" alt="Guider claimed he had killed nine-year-old Samantha Knight (pictured) accidentally after he kidnapped the nine-year-old from near her Bondi home. Samantha's body has not been found" class="blkBorder img-share" style="max-width:100%" /> </div> <noscript> <img id="i-4e697b8bdafd0d72" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2019/09/06/05/18137344-7434019-image-a-9_1567744867840.jpg" height="477" width="634" alt="Guider claimed he had killed nine-year-old Samantha Knight (pictured) accidentally after he kidnapped the nine-year-old from near her Bondi home. Samantha's body has not been found" class="blkBorder img-share" /> </noscript> </div> <p class="imageCaption">Guider claimed he had killed nine-year-old Samantha Knight (pictured) accidentally after he kidnapped the nine-year-old from near her Bondi home. Samantha's body has not been found</p></div><div class="moduleFull mol-video"><div><div itemprop="video" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/VideoObject"><meta content="Samantha Knight's Knight's mother speaks after decision to release paedophile killer Michael Guider.&quot;,&quot;referenceId&quot;:1997706,&quot;grapeshot&quot;:{&quot;article&quot;:{&quot;articleURL&quot;:&quot;https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8845637/Paedophile-Michael-Guider-killed-schoolgirl-Samantha-Knight-secretly-living-community.html&quot;}}}" preload="none"> <source src="https://videos.dailymail.co.uk/video/mol/2019/09/03/2547637819719961881/1024x576_MP4_2547637819719961881.mp4" type="video/mp4"></source> </video> </div> </div> </div></div></div><p class="mol-para-with-font">He cannot go to pools, playing fields and sporting facilities, concerts, theatre shows, movies, events and activities intended for the entertainment of children.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">And he cannot visit any residence where he knows that someone aged under 18 ordinarily lives.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Places used solely or mainly for the sale or display of sexually explicit material, or for providing sexual services or sexually explicit entertainment are also off limits.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Those conditions were not enough to satisfy Chantelle Daly or his other victims.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'Paedophiles are given too many rights after hurting and abusing children,' Ms Daly said. 'It doesn't make any sense to me.</p><div class="mol-img-group floatRHS" style="style"> <div class="mol-img"> <div class="image-wrap"> <img id="i-5560aad5de72a6c" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2020/10/17/01/18137254-8845637-Michael_Guider_69_served_17_years_for_the_manslaughter_of_school-a-1_1602896231112.jpg" height="411" width="305" alt="Michael Guider, 69, served 17 years for the manslaughter of schoolgirl Samantha Knight" class="blkBorder img-share" style="max-width:100%" /> </div> <noscript> <img id="i-5560aad5de72a6c" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2020/10/17/01/18137254-8845637-Michael_Guider_69_served_17_years_for_the_manslaughter_of_school-a-1_1602896231112.jpg" height="411" width="305" alt="Michael Guider, 69, served 17 years for the manslaughter of schoolgirl Samantha Knight" class="blkBorder img-share" /> </noscript> </div> <p class="imageCaption">Michael Guider, 69, served 17 years for the manslaughter of schoolgirl Samantha Knight</p></div><p class="mol-para-with-font">'It makes me feel physically sick that he can walk past children in the street.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'I'm not saying he's going to go to a park - I don't think he's that dumb - but he can still go to beaches and to shopping centres.'</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">For the next four years Guider must not possess or use alcohol or illegal drugs and submit to testing for both.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He cannot enter any licensed premises including hotels, bars and clubs - but excluding cafes and restaurants - without approval.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider must not approach or have contact with anyone he knows or 'reasonably should know' is under 18, other than 'incidental contact in a public place' unless he is in the company of an approved person.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">His supervisor can notify anyone Guider associates with who has children in their care of his criminal history and can stop him from seeing anyone he or she tells him not to.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">If Guider wants to see a sex worker that can only be done with the approval of the supervisor, who also must be told if he starts a romantic relationship.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He will need permission to join any club or organisation and any social media network.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He cannot change his name from Michael Anthony Guider  which Daily Mail Australia has previously revealed might not even be his real name - without approval.</p><div class="art-ins mol-factbox news" data-version="2" id="mol-565ed1a0-0f5a-11eb-b4db-8124ddc3e48b" data-permabox-url="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8845637/Paedophile-Michael-Guider-killed-schoolgirl-Samantha-Knight-secretly-living-community.html"> <h3 class="mol-factbox-title">Michael Guider was molesting kids for years before and after he killed Bondi schoolgirl Samantha Knight</h3> <div class="ins cleared mol-factbox-body"> <p class="mol-para-with-font">Samantha Knight's 1986 disappearance from near her mother's home at Bondi in Sydney's eastern suburbs remained a mystery for 15 years.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Michael Guider has never publicly expressed any remorse for killing the schoolgirl and her body has never been found.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">She was one of perhaps dozens of children aged two to 16 who Guider molested over many years. His usual method of offending was to drug then molest pre-pubescent girls.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider first molested Samantha when she was living with her mother Tess at Manly in 1984 and 1985.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He snatched Samantha from near her home in Imperial Avenue, Bondi, after school on August 19, 1986.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">The honey-blonde, green-eyed girl had been seen that afternoon walking the streets in her uniform. Within days Sydney was plastered with 'Find our Sam' posters which described her as intelligent, outgoing and well-spoken.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider later claimed he had drugged Samantha with the sleeping pill Normison and she died of an overdose on his lounge while he went out to the shops.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He has since claimed he had nothing to do with her death.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Many of Guider's victims were the daughters of mothers he had befriended and he sexually assaulted them during babysitting sessions.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider played a 'game' called statues with some victims in which he ordered them to stand still while he exposed himself and touched their genitals.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He took thousands of images of the children he violated while they were unconscious. Some of his victims have not been identified.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">In 1996 Guider was sentenced to a minimum ten years and six months for 60 offences committed against 11 children between 1980 and 1986.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Four years later he was convicted of further sex offences against children but his release date was extended by only six months.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">While in custody he was linked to Samantha Knight's disappearance.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Guider was charged with Samantha's murder in February 2001 but pleaded guilty to manslaughter under the weight of damning evidence including a confession to his brother Tim.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">He was sentenced to 17 years with a non-parole period of 12 years to date from June 2002. The maximum sentence expired last year.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Efforts to keep Guider in custody beyond his original sentence failed and he was released on an extended supervision order which will last for five years.</p></div><div data-swipe-article="false">
<div class="adHolder mpu" id="mpu_factbox_1"><!- - ad: https://mads.dailymail.co.uk/v6/us/news/none/article/other/mpu_factbox.html - -><script>adverts.addToArray({"pos":"mpu_factbox"})</script><span class="mol-ads-label-container"><span class="mol-ads-label">Advertisement</span></span>
</div>
</div> </div></div>

<script>
DM.later('bundle', function () {
  DMS.Puff.init({
    twitter: {
      newsUS: {
        text: '@DailyMail',
        account: 'DailyMail'
      },
      newsAU:{
        text: '@DailyMailAU',
        account: 'DailyMailAU'
      }
    }
  });
});      
</script></ul>
</div>
